name: SwapMind
description:
A puzzle game where you control 2 characters at once, and you can swap positions at any time. 

This was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, and is my first ever game jam!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Space to swap

R to restart

F11/F to fullscreen.

ESC to go back to the main menu.
